instructions: Go to Settings > Bluetooth on your iOS device. If Bluetooth is disabled, tap the toggle switch to turn it on. Press the Xbox logo button in the center of the controller to power it on. Only Xbox controllers with Bluetooth support can connect to your iOS device . You can check for Bluetooth support on the controller s box, if you still have it, or by looking at the controller itself. Newer Xbox controllers with Bluetooth support have a traditional audio jack, while older models only have a square port. Firmly press the Sync button at the top of the controller until the Xbox logo button begins to flash. Your Xbox controller should appear in the list of Other Devices. Tap its name to pair it to your iOS device. Open the iOS video game of your choice and tap Controller , or a phrasing similar to this, from its in-app settings.
